scripts.compile:scss: npx mkdirp dist/assets/css && npx node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 ./assets/sass/style.scss dist/assets/css/style.css
scripts.compile:js: npx mkdirp dist/assets/js && npx copy ./assets/js/main.js dist/
scripts.compile: npm run compile:pug && npm run compile:scss && npm run compile:js && npm run compile:img
scripts.vendor: npx copy ./assets/vendor/*/* dist/ && npx copy ./assets/vendor/bootstrap-icons/fonts/* dist
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run vendor
